title: Shaun White comes up short of medal in Olympic men's halfpipe, final competition of his career
content:
1. Shaun White comes up short of medal in Olympic men's halfpipe, final competition of his career  USA TODAY
  2. Team USA snowboarding legend Shaun White crashes out on final Olympic run  CNN
  3. Shaun White's retirement made his legacy clear  The Washington Post
  4. Snowboarder Shaun White places fourth in halfpipe in final Olympics competition, Japan's Ayumu Hirano wins gold  ESPN
  5. NBC's Todd Richards torches halfpipe judges for controversial Ayumu Hirano score  Yahoo Sports
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Shaun White comes up short of medal in Olympic men's halfpipe, final competition of his career  USA TODAY
Team USA snowboarding legend Shaun White crashes out on final Olympic run  CNN
Shaun White's retirement made his legacy clear  The Washington Post
Snowboarder Shaun White places fourth in halfpipe in final Olympics competition, Japan's Ayumu Hirano wins gold  ESPN
NBC's Todd Richards torches halfpipe judges for controversial Ayumu Hirano score  Yahoo Sports

localize.title: ショーン・ホワイト、キャリア最後の大会となったオリンピック男子ハーフパイプでメダルには届かず
肖恩-怀特在奥运会男子半管滑冰比赛中与奖牌失之交臂，这是他职业生涯的最后一次比赛。
肖恩-懷特在奧運會男子半管滑冰比賽中與獎牌失之交臂，這是他職業生涯的最後一次比賽。
